content.text:
# List of schools in the Republic of Ireland

This is a partial list of schools in the Republic of Ireland, listed by county. It includes primary and secondary schools that are publicly funded, private, or fee-paying institutions across all counties of the Republic of Ireland. This list excludes special education centers and pre-schools. The data is accurate as of March 2023.
